definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: Since the heart can warm the body, it pertains to fire.
sentences.chinese: 心阳有温煦之功能，故心属火。

sentences.english: The approach of spring brings warm weather.
sentences.chinese: 春季邻近带来了温煦的气候。

sentences.english: Body temperature is maintained with the warming function of Qi.
sentences.chinese: 人体的体温是依靠气的温煦作用来维持固定。

sentences.english: His warm smile warms her cold heart.
sentences.chinese: 他温煦的笑容融化了她那颗冰冷的心。

sentences.english: Whether man's body temperature is normal or not depends on the warming action of qi.
sentences.chinese: 人体体温正常与否依赖于气的温煦作用。

definition: qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
evil influence/unhealthy trend/(a person's) evil air/aura of wickedness/(TCM) pathogenic energy (opposite: 正氣|正气[zheng4 qi4], vital energy)
